product_name: IT CosmeticsYour Most Beautiful You 3-in-1 Makeup Palette
summary: SummaryIT Cosmetics Your Most Beautiful You 3-in-1 Makeup Palette is all about the naturally pretty look of vitality and radiance.
details: DetailsBenefits3-in-1 must-have palette with Drops of Light Technology for the naturally pretty look of vitalityMatte bronzer warms your complexion, radiance luminizer adds a lit-from-within glow & brightening blush creates your youthful flush of colorTalc-free, highly pigmented, ultra long-wearing shadesIncludesLuminizer in Live (0.19 oz)Bronzer in Laugh (0.39 oz)Blush in Love (0.2 oz)Packaging may varyItem 2264091How To UseSwirl your favorite IT Cosmetics brush in bronzer and apply where the sun naturally hits your face, including your forehead, nose and chin. Then, brush luminizer over the areas of your face you wish to appear visually lifted, including the top of your cheekbones and brow bones. Add a youthful flush of color by applying blush to the apples of your cheeks. See enclosed how-to guide for reference. Recommended to use with IT Brushes For ULTA Airbrush Powder Wand Brush #108 for best results. Just lightly dust over the apples of your cheeks using light, upward sweeping motions. Just the lightest touch of this blush, provides a gorgeous flush of color that lasts all day! For more intense color, apply a second dusting of blush. If you over apply, dust a bit of foundation or finishing powder over the top to soften. Beauty tip: To achieve the perfect bronze glow, swirl your brush in both the matte bronzer and radiance luminizer, then dust onto your face and d√©collet√© for beautifully soft results.IngredientsLuminizer G2035880 Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Boron Nitride, Zinc Stearate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbic Acid, Silica, Hyaluronic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Paraffinum Liquidum / Mineral Oil / Huile Minerale, Cocos Nucifera Oil / Coconut Oil, Aqua / Water / Eau, Butylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Carbomer, Sodium Lactate, Polysorbate 20, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, [+/- May Contain / Peut Contenir, Mica, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Ci 77491, Ci 77492 / Iron Oxides, Ci 77742 / Manganese Violet, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake]. N70051980/1Bronzer G2035878 Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Boron Nitride, Zinc Stearate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Silica, Sorbic Acid, Tin Oxide, Colophonium / Rosin / Colophane, Hyaluronic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Paraffinum Liquidum / Mineral Oil / Huile Minerale, Cocos Nucifera Oil / Coconut Oil, Aqua / Water / Eau, Butylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Carbomer, Sodium Lactate, Polysorbate 20, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, [+/- May Contain / Peut Contenir, Mica, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides, Ci 77742 / Manganese Violet, Ci 15850 / Red 7 Lake, Ci 45410 / Red 28 Lake, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake]. reviews.headline: My Make Up looks like a Pro did it!
reviews.comments: Never contoured before and this looks great and is easy to do.

reviews.headline: Inaccurate website photo description
reviews.comments: The product i received has a completely different highlight color than what the picture online shows. I received a deep bronze highlight in my pallet

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: It goes on smoothly and lasts a long time

reviews.headline: Your Most Beautiful You palette
reviews.comments:
I bought this on a whim at my local ulta. I tell you, since I purchased this in March I have only used this palette in my daily routine. I use the sparkle for eye shadow and the bronzer as eye shadow as well as bronzer. The blush is very pigmented so i just tap it and apply just a bit. 
Its so handy to have it all in one spot and I have received so many compliments from my coworkers , I've been a little shocked! This is a great palette, you wont be disappointed!

reviews.headline: I love this product exceptional quality and colors
reviews.comments: Absolutely stunning look and color very natural

reviews.headline: Definitely a keeper!
reviews.comments: Natural color, a hint of soft pink, highlighter without too much shimmer. Just what I was looking for!

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again again,
reviews.comments: I love it is so good for my face is incredible

reviews.headline: LOVE IT! üòç
reviews.comments: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT COSMETICS FACE PALETTE! THE PALETTE HAS EVERYTHING I NEED! BRONZER, BLUSH & FACE ILLUMINATEUR! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED:)‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.headline: I buy & buy & buy again!
reviews.comments: Beautiful colors! I get compliments every time I wear this. I've purchased it over and over again! The colors are perfect for year round wear.

reviews.headline: Unfortunately, I can't like this.
reviews.comments: I love the color of the blush especially, but I finally figured out that it was the cause of my breakouts. Too bad I cant return this anymore, because it feels wrong to throw it away.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: This is a great product it's three  in one, love it

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: None

reviews.headline: Love this all-in-one!
reviews.comments: This is my first bronzer/blush combo and I'm mad at myself for not switching sooner.  The colors are just right for me (medium-light complexion) and the highlighter is not too shimmery which I like!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: LOVE IT

reviews.headline: Beautiful everyday makeup
reviews.comments: You can wear this on top of your moistorizer and spf for an everyday natural makeup look. You may have to reapply throughout the day. It's convenient.

reviews.headline: So glad I got this!
reviews.comments: First of all, I'm blown away by the size of this- it is really big, I've had products I've purchased before arrive so small. This was worth every penny . You can use as much color as you wish- subtle glow or full out day at the beach looks! Or use one color individually, or like me, swirl your brush around all 3!

reviews.headline: Great Beauty Product!
reviews.comments: l bought this to replace my beauty kit recommended by my friend. This has been so handy to have all 3 bronzer/blush/highlight together.  The colors are perfectly pigmented and lasts all day.  l use it daily for work and it has lasted about 6-8 months. There is a lot of product inside! l am about to order another one.  This has traveled on many trips across country and road trips without breaking in my carryon luggage. Just buy it, you will like it!!

reviews.headline: I would buy this again. In fact I had this before and used i
reviews.comments: I have used this before and loved it

reviews.headline: My 2nd one I've bought
reviews.comments: This is a must have in my daily make up routine. I love this palette. It matches my skin tone perfectly. I'm so thankful for whatever reason I talked myself into buying it. I normally spend the bare minimum on make up, because I don't invest much time putting it on daily. I just do what I can, in the quickest amount of time just to make sure I don't scare anyone when I'm out in public. This palette helps tremendously.

reviews.headline: Great collection!
reviews.comments: A perfect color palette for contour, blush and highlight. Great saturation of color and easily layered.

faceoff_positive.comments: I just love this pallet...I bought this a few months ago...I had one that lasted for a year and took it to Italy with me mainly because you can use all three, not only on your face to contour & highlight...but you can use all three as eyeshadows. It eliminates taking separate pieces...all you need is foundation, mascara and eyeliner...and some lipgloss or lipstick...very compact with stunning results. The only thing i would suggest is making the opening a little easier by replacing the current one with an easy press button as I find myself fumbling to open it and concerned that I may drop it and break it.  One easy press would help especially for people that are somewhat challenged.
faceoff_positive.headline: This does it all!

faceoff_negative.comments: I truly like this product!  Yet I wholeheartedly agree that it is a huge turn off to try to open every day-it stops your daily Go!  Time to listen to all of the ladies who love your product and hate the "clasp" .  I also agree that the highlighter fell apart pretty quickly while the others stayed intact. Obviously, the need for more highlighter is what we want. It could stop the sales of this wonderful idea-why not tweak it and flow on?!!:-)  It would be great to  see you actually satisfy all issues- this could be so many women's mainstay!! Make the entire amount given  thicker (more highlighter as well) and  lose the present method of  opening.  All positive ? all good? Well time to step up! Thank you :-)
faceoff_negative.headline: Excellent product but
